MS MCQs

    OCR technologies in Power Automate Desktop

    »

    1. Which one of the following OCR engines does Power Automate Desktop support?

      Microsoft MODI

      Google Tesseract

      Both


    2. Width and height multipliers make the OCR extraction more effective, when:

      You set them to the highest possible values

      You set them to one

      They are set to two or three


    3. The Wait for text on screen (OCR) action waits for a text to:

      Appear on the screen

      Disappear from the screen

      Appear to or disappear from the screen
